name: Alpha Authority
description:
⋅ Alpha Authority is a unique community based formerly in the Roblox Clans & Guilds forum community. Created in 2013 as a War Clan, we've been on the Bloxy Award nominations, had over 31,000 users in our group player base, and had hundreds to join in single events. We are a valiant force to be reckoned with, symbolized by the White Wolf: Family, Teamwork, Loyalty, Ferocity, Survival.

⋅ It is our philosophy that fun derives true success for each player in our clan. Alpha Authority embraces this ideal, allowing our members to interact with our economy, housing, tournaments, special events, and participate with us while holding our members enjoyment at the upmost importance.

⋅ If you're interested at all, please look to the left and click the 'Join' button, to start your journey!  More information about our site, external websites, recent news, etc. is found below. Thanks for reading!

⋅ Alpha Magazine ≻ https://devforum.roblox.com/t/1801072
